direction.raw_text: Everybody thinks you got rich of betting against the system. If they only knew...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The powers that be will never let that happen. Jacob's not arguing it...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: How much is enough, Gordon? Gordon laughs with a shake of the head.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I've been asked that before... (AND THEN) They took a hundred, twenty two thousand, six hundred and forty hours from me... for a goddamn victimless crime. All the while I sit in my 8 by
direction.name: direction

result.heading: AND ALONG THE BANKS OF THE PERSIAN GULF

direction.raw_text: and watch real crooks by the thousands give out mortgages like candy, package them into unexplainable derivatives and spit the cancer out into the world. And he just shakes his head...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And when I get out... who's there waiting for me? Nobody. (BEAT) You better believe I'm going to get mine.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You're not going to miss America?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'll always have America... it's why I'm here. I'm buying the island. (BEAT) I know it's kitschy but it's fun and good for business. Looking over the water...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I have a lot business abroad now. Interests in an Australian copper mine, a German solar company, some Russian oil pipelines, a casino in Macau... see Jake, America just isn't where the action is anymore.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What happened to the precious depreciating asset of time?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It still trades... And he turns to Jacob with a smile...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ... but I'm a billionaire now, Pal.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm out, Gordon, I'm done trading.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I don't know why. You pulled it off, Kid, you took him down -- granted with my help -- but you atoned for Zabel's sins with Bretton's money. (BEAT) As I see it, you're just getting started. And Jacob stops walking then slowly turns to Gordon with...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Did you ever really want to reconcile with her?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (of course I did) I'm human.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . Glaring at him...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Then why did you do it? And Gordon... strongly holding Jacob's glare... simply replies...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Same answer.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: But it didn't work. Gordon sadly shrugs...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I've been trying to wire two hundred million into her bank account but she won't accept it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I know. She doesn't want it... we don't want it. (BEAT) Because it's not about what you have... it's about what you do. And Gordon -- it's never about the money. Gordon shakes his head.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That sounds good. I bet you can even wrap it in a pretty red bow. But Champ, it's idealistic... and idealism kills every trade. (BEAT) Winnie will realize that at some point... and then we'll be fine. And Jacob finally looks away... in pity.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: See Jacob -- the hustle we all fall for is actually thinking we can fight what's inherent, what's inevitable... that we can somehow undo what genetics, or God, or whatever name you wanna tag it, has placed deep inside of us. Because whether it's greed or revenge or the compulsion to chase... it all amounts to the same thing... loss of control. And it's always going to be there and it's always going to be stronger than you, Pal. Now walking again...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's why bubbles will always exist and it's why we're all currently in this mess. Joining Gordon's stride...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Winnie's pregnant. And Gordon stops walking.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's going to be a boy.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What do you want?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's bad out there, Gordon, people are panicked. They're not looking to their government. They're not looking to their trusted advisors. They're looking to you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You want me to buy? And Jacob Moore... slowly confirming...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Publicly and aggressively. Gordon just looks at him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: But they're all lemmings. Simple psychology. You once said every crash should have a JP Morgan to step in and save it. (BEAT) Well Gordon -- this is your chance to be JP Morgan. And now Gordon shakes his head...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We're far from the bottom. It'll be a dead cat bounce.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It'll buy us time. That's all I'm asking for... time. (BEAT) Time for the new administration to put their plan into action.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What do I get in return?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . As Gordon turns... takes in the city of Dubai... in all of its ridiculous splendor...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Full clemency.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You can offer that?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Your daughter can. She works with the new Secretary of Treasury now. Considering that...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What else?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Winnie. Me. Your grandson. Something money can't buy... a family. And Gordon looks at him for the longest moments, allowing it all to register, then...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sorry son -- that's simply a trade I cannot make. And as Gordon Gekko walks off... leaving Jacob Moore behind...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (V.O.) (CONT'D) You wanna know what the mother of all bubbles was? Us. The human race. Scientists call it the Cambrian Explosion, from the Cambrian fauna.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: As Jacob heads into the baggage claim area to see Winnie waiting for him...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (V.O.) (CONT'D) It happened 530 million years ago... when all of the sudden, there was the seemingly rapid appearance of most major groups of complex animals. And as they embrace...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (V.O.) (CONT'D) And from it was born humanity.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Being led through a massive empty space... office space...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (V.O.) (CONT'D) It was an explosion of life. Scientists will tell you it was unprecedented, excessive and by the standards of evolution-time... happened in a flash. The City of London outside the large windows...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Suddenly the world had millions of new species... just like that. This will be the home of his new international empire.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: At his desk in his 15 CPW penthouse...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (V.O.) (CONT'D) See -- bubbles are the purest form of Darwinism. ... looking over pages and pages of destruction... Andrew Zabel's legacy that he now has to pay for...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (V.O.) (CONT'D) They teach us what we didn't know and they remind us of what we forgot... And Bretton completely loses it... just starts ripping out the pages then tearing them in two...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (V.O.) (CONT'D) They kill excess and they lean out the herd. ... methodically... page by page... over and over again...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sitting in his massive London office. It's empty. It's night. He's completely alone. He looks up at the wall... at the framed picture of JP Morgan and Uncle Sam rowing that boat. Then he looks down at an old picture of Winnie... she's probably three or four years old... and lovingly holding her baby brother, Rudy. And Gordon holds on this picture for a long moment, before finally...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (V.O.) (CONT'D) They actually bring us back to the necessary simple...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . ... picking up the phone.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Now in the back of a Town Car... we don't know where...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (V.O.) (CONT'D) Because Jacob... As the door opens, daylight spills in and we see the charging bull of Bowling Green Park across the way... Gordon is escorted out of the car and led to the doors of the New York stock exchange. And Gordon stops at the famed doors, takes a moment to regard the exchange, sucks in a deep breath, readies for his hero's welcome and finally... opens the doors then disappears inside.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Greet the morning in their small Washington DC apartment. Winnie pouring coffee, Jacob turning on the TV. And on the screen is a picture of Gordon Gekko walking the floor of the New York stock exchange under the graphic... "Gekko Now Betting On A Recovery."
direction.name: direction
